titleStmt.title: Animadversions on Mr. William Dells book intituled The crucified and quickned Christian. By Humfry Chambers, D.D. Pastor of Pewsy in the county of Wilts. Novemb. vicessimo, 1652. Imprimatur John Owen Vicecan. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Chambers, Humphrey, 1598 or 9-1662.

titleStmt.title: Animadversions on Mr. William Dells book intituled The crucified and quickned Christian. By Humfry Chambers, D.D. Pastor of Pewsy in the county of Wilts. Novemb. vicessimo, 1652. Imprimatur John Owen Vicecan. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Chambers, Humphrey, 1598 or 9-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.N. for Sa. Gellibrand, at the Ball in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A reply to and reprinting (including title page, dedication, and "To the reader") of: Dell, William. The crucified and quickened Christian.
Annotation on Thomason copy E.686[3]: "ffebruary. 2 1652"; "A subtill sectary" is inserted between 'Dell' and 'minister'. On E.686[3]: "ffebr. 17"; the final I in the date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
